author: snwebb
body:
#### PR description:

Add a new class in `Geometry/HGCalCommonData/` which transforms the `(u,v)` coordinates of a module in "sector 0" (i.e. 0-120) to the correct coordinates in sectors 1 or 2. The reverse function is also provided.

This is a base class intended for use in derived classes, and as such does not modify any existing code or output, at present.

This PR is made in conjunction with @jbsauvan 

#### PR validation:

Standard tests have been run successfully. No changes to output expected.
title: New HGCal silicon module rotation class
